en.title: Maintenance Notice
en.message:
To better serve you, we will be carrying out maintenance of our digital services on 18th Feb (Sun).
On 18 Feb, from 3:00am to 8:00am, SC Mobile and Online Banking will not be available

en.title: Scam Alert :
en.message: Beware of a phishing scam offering promotional Fixed Deposit rates via text messages. Always verify the authenticity of promotions on the SC Singapore website. We would never contact you using a +65 number, direct you to a personal mobile number or request you to transfer funds. Please do not disclose your personal particulars and OTP to anyone.

forceUpgrade.message-en: You're using an older version of SC Mobile. Please update your app now to enjoy the new standard of banking. Thank you for banking with Standard Chartered. Tap here to know minimum OS and device requirements.
forceUpgrade.message-zh: 您使用的是旧版本的渣打银行移动银行。请立即更新应用程序以采用本行的新业务标准。感谢您使用渣打银行。 点击此处了解操作系统和设备的最低要求

waitingRoom.message-en: We are currently experiencing high traffic on SC Mobile, which may prevent you from successfully logging in. In the meantime, please visit sc.com/hk and try logging into Online Banking from there. Apologies for any inconvenience caused. To login Online Securities Trading, please use SC Equities or access via https://wealth.standardchartered.com.hk/ows-oe/foa/login.htm for direct login.
waitingRoom.message-zh: 由於現時使用SC Mobile的人數較多，你暫時未能成功登入。你可到我們的網站 sc.com/hk 登入渣打網上理財。不便之處，敬請原諒。 請用SC Equities或使用以下網址直接登錄股票交易服務: https://wealth.standardchartered.com.hk/ows-oe/foa/login.htm?lang=zh_HK。
